vulnerability.name: USN-2705-1
vulnerability.description: Qin Zhao discovered Keystone disabled certification verification when the "insecure" option is set in a paste configuration (paste.ini) file regardless of the value, which allows remote attackers to conduct machine-in-the-middle attacks via a crafted certificate. (CVE-2014-7144)  Brant Knudson discovered Keystone disabled certification verification when the "insecure" option is set in a paste configuration (paste.ini) file regardless of the value, which allows remote attackers to conduct machine-in-the-middle attacks via a crafted certificate. (CVE-2015-1852)

statements.status_notes: Keystone could be made to expose sensitive information over the network.
